pr_title: DPC-443 limit the number of members in roster

timeline.message: limit the number of members in roster

timeline.author: dhgreene

timeline.bodyText: This is the kind of thing we want to be setting via an environment variable, especially since we expect it to change over time.  Adding a new one will require an associated dpc-ops PR request and an addition to our store of secrets.  😄
timeline.author: dhgreene

replies.bodyText: with the 3rd party tool we use, the philosophy of the tool is to make application.conf store all the defaults and anything environment specific would be stored in prod.application.yml and etc..  So I added ${PATIENT_LIMIT} to prod.application.yml and all other environments will just use the default
replies.author: MrBilnon

replies.bodyText: That's great!  Let's set prod-sbx to have a default of 5000, and the lower environments to have no limit, then.
replies.author: dhgreene

replies.bodyText: If we don’t want a limit for the lower environments then we can just take it out of application.conf as I coded this in a way where if it’s null, then there is no limit.
replies.author: MrBilnon

timeline.message: add environment override for patientLimit to prod.application.conf and correct naming of method
make provider and patient limit configurable
